about_the_game:
THE LAST GOLDEN FOX

A game based on waves of attacks in which evil portals were created in a rich and peaceful village of golden foxes, and creatures from another dimension ended up kidnapping all the existing golden foxes. But one of the foxes managed to escape, and your mission is to protect it from these creatures that want to destroy the last golden fox of the group!


Gameplay


  • You control a friendly character with a powerful slingshot who must defend the last golden fox from successive waves of attacks.
  • Cada onda de ataque consiste em diferentes tipos de inimigos com personalidades próprias. Alguns inimigos podem ser mais difíceis de derrotar do que outros e requerem diferentes estratégias para serem combatidos.
  • Waves of attacks become increasingly intense and challenging as you progress. With each new wave, more enemies will appear, making the challenge even greater.
  • You will be able to summon allies to help protect the fox.
  • The game features a scoring system, where you earn points for each enemy you defeat, and can also collect gold coins dropped by defeated enemies. These coins can be used to unlock new abilities, upgrades, and special allies for the player.


    Features
  • satisfying gameplay
  • progressive difficulty
  • easy controls
  • skill improvement
  • special attacks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Protect the last golden fox at all costs! Fight against hordes of monsters and prevent them from taking the precious fox through the portal. Be quick and strategic with your slingshot in this epic battle for the survival of the Golden Fox. Will you be able to defend it or will it become extinct?
